programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Nelly uncovers Geraldine and Benny's secret. Arasi's plan to make new friends doesn't go very well, while Brayden meets with a scary new Chinese tuition teacher.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - My Unique Farm
programme.desc: (Encore) Producer, travel business owner but now Lee Xian Jie farms rice and harvests tea in Japan, skills he learnt in just two years. How did this 33-year-old end up in Ryujinmura and does farming pay?

programme.title: Whispers Of The Dead
programme.desc: Prof Chao proves otherwise to save Harry Johnson from the gallows for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Don't Forget The Lyrics USA S5
programme.desc: Don't Forget the Lyrics! is an American television game show in which contestants compete to win $1 million by correctly recalling song lyrics from a variety of genres.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Taste Of Australia With Hayden Quinn
programme.desc: An epic day on the amazing Bruny Island - surfing, beach foraging, baking and crayfish!

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: (Encore) All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S2
programme.desc: Curtis heads to his hometown of Melbourne with his brother Luke to visit old friends and taste new culinary creations.They start with a visit to Kate Reid of Lune Bakery who has taken croissant making to a whole new level. And later, Curtis heads to the Attica kitchen with chef Ben Shewry to cook with indigenous Australian ingredients, like Kangaroo. Curtis and Luke visit one of Maude's producers of exquisite olive oil and then jets to Blackmore Farms to barbecue on the open range.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Street Food Asia
programme.desc: Luke continues through the streets of Saigon in District One visiting his favourite Pho restaurant, He uncovers a family dispute between two sisters with competing food stalls both called number one Xi G, Then he is off to Miss Yung-Jow, his very own lunch lady' who has been cooking a different dish every day for twenty years. In District 4, Luke revisits a family-favourite restaurant, Qun oc Oanh, where he's enticed by the aromas as he explores the street before cooking spicy Chilli Crab Claws.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: The Beigoma Academy Bey Club faces Quon's Ice Blaze in the first match of the National Tournament team battles. Valt couldn't be more excited to take on his new hero. But when his leadership is called into question, Valt starts to second-guess his position as team captain.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S2
programme.desc: The little trains promise to go to the railway stop festival with Eric. But on the very day, Eric faces an urgent issue and can't go to the festival. The little trains want to go to the festival but can't leave Eric behind....

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Ollie's been asked the create a sculpture that will be seen all over the world. But he gets so caught up with his work that he forgets to be love and helpful to others... until Rover needs his help. Will Ollie choose his work or his friends? The gang and the aliens go on a camping trip but sloppy and the aliens can't enjoy the great outdoors. All they're worried about is how there's no internet connection! Their love of tech devices get them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: 气候变换
programme.desc: (重) 替代线性经济的是循环经济。概念就是，所生产的东西都会回归系统里，没有浪费，就算是废物，也可以重新想象成资源。每项资源都获得重生，甚至是多次重生的机会。循环经济就是以大自然为榜样，在自然界中，组装过程采用材料的方式非常有效，因为几何图形本来就存在。我们需要对我们和大自然，以及生态系统的关系更有意识，同时认真看待，并学会一种和谐的共存方式。.

programme.title: 童工
programme.desc: Linh和Hao是两个十来岁的童工，家住胡志明市近郊一个贫民村；Linh以捡田螺为业，Hao靠采摘蔬菜养家，两人一天赚不到新币3元。农历年前夕，Linh一家被逼迁、Hao父亲失业，整个年过得愁云惨雾.

programme.title: 异乡。驿客
programme.desc: 第二集 日本：日本人讲究礼仪，不化妆不出门，吃面出声才算好，兜大圈子不敢说不好，地铁车厢里不能讲手机，在银行不用签名只能用印章。想要融入得学好日语。单身生活一样过得好，自己吃面唱卡拉，一样开心没烦恼.

programme.title: 爱情是Beautiful, 人生是Wonderful

programme.title: 天生一对
programme.desc: 德特观察“佳拉洁”，发现她行为怪异、说话颠三倒四，认为她一定是疯了。然而，德特父亲却坚信“佳拉洁”会逐渐恢复的.
